misuse: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
vulnerable_code:
SecureRandom random = new SecureRandom();
int x = random.nextInt();
description: The usage of SecureRandom for generating random integers without specifying a specific random number generation algorithm may lead to insufficiently random values being generated.
recommendation: Use a more specific random number generation algorithm and seed the SecureRandom instance properly to ensure an adequately random output.
